basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Jacob Crabbe Memorial Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to undergraduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Special Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be a Special Education major 3.0 GPA or higher Full-time undergraduate student (12+ hours) Must be a junior or senior in the semester the scholarship is awarded Demonstrate financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
